title: Emerald and Diamond Bridal Kantha Haaram: The "Haritha Shobha"
materials: South Sea Pearls (ముత్యాలు). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Intricate floral-inspired diamond lattice work. The central pendant showcases a pear-shaped Emerald surrounded by a dazzling halo of diamonds. Pearl drops provide a delicate, feminine touch. The necklace features a unique adjustable clasp for a perfect fit, maintaining the traditional Haaram's opulent look.
occasions: or any grand celebratory occasion. Also
ideal for a special event where you wish to exude timeless elegance and make a memorable statement.
description: This 'Haritha Shobha' Haaram is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds are carefully selected for their brilliance and color. The intricate design represents the finest craftsmanship, ensuring a heirloom piece that can be passed down through generations. Its adjustable nature caters to modern needs while upholding tradition, creating a unique blend of beauty and functionality. The Hyderabadi Polish offers unmatched luster and durability, making this piece a lasting investment.
